title: Twin Peaks intro credits
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123731im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Twin_Peaks_S1Pilot_0_5892.jpg)

Hopefully, this can be settled once and for all. It's been identified as ITC Avant Garde Gothic Condensed Demi Bold at another message board, but the K doesn't match.

Video with samples here: [http://www.artofthetitle.com/title/twin-peaks/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123731/http:/www.artofthetitle.com/title/twin-peaks/ "http://www.artofthetitle.com/title/twin-peaks/")

Font: 

 ITC Avant Garde Gothic Condense (Demi Bold) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123731/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Pico

comments.content:
**[ITC Avant Garde Gothic Condense (Demi Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123731/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=ITC%20Avant%20Garde%20Gothic%20Condense%20-%20Demi&fid=1216759613ed49ffd1464282dcc6dfe9&fsize=60&text=TWIN%20PEAKS&wrap=2)** looks fine, including the |K|.  
Take a better look, some weights of Avant Garde Gothic have a different |K but Condensed Demi Bold looks like an exact match.
That's odd, I must have looked at another version. Oh, well - thanks!
